## Summary
First Orion session for a skills review across Cursor user skills, project-specific skills, and the general `.agent/skills/skills` library. Findings include a verified inventory, identified gaps for the United Trades stack (Next.js 15, Supabase, Make.com, Vapi.ai, Twilio, OpenAI GPT-4o), and recommendations for curation of the large `.agent` skill set plus proposed project skills to add next.
